price: Ва кўп ўлжаларки, уларни оладилар. Аллоҳ Азиз, Ҳаким бўлган Зотдир.
arabic: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةٗ يَأۡخُذُونَهَاۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamaghānima kathīratan yakhudhūnahā wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
